channel.title: About on Zekai Lu (陆泽凯)
channel.description: Recent content in About on Zekai Lu (陆泽凯)

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Zekai Lu(陆泽凯) is a social science researcher from China who is currently a senior student in the Department of Sociology at Guangzhou University. His areas of interest include medical sociology, social psychology and computational sociology.Zekai hopes to focus on the field of medical sociology in his future PhD research.Zekai has already published many works on some English and Chinese journal. Zekai’s favourite poem is by Du Fu, 窗含西岭千秋雪，门泊东吴万里船。
